speakers.title: AWS Certified Trainer
speakers.name: Rahul Mishra
speakers.summary: AWS Certified Trainer, ICSI | CNSS Certified Network Security Specialist, Certified File Transfer Professional, MERN Full Stack Developer, Intern at JP MORGAN , Virtual Intern at GoldmanSachs, Virtual Intern at Microsoft, Author International Journal of Scientific Engineering and Research.
speakers.description:
Rahul is a AWS Certified Trainer, ICSI | CNSS Certified Network Security Specialist, Certified File Transfer Professional, MERN Full Stack Developer, Intern at JP MORGAN , Virtual Intern at Goldman Sachs, Virtual Intern at Microsoft, Author International Journal of Scientific Engineering and Research (https://www.ijser.org/research-paper-publishing-august-2020_page2.aspx).

He Achieved Rank 102 in Cloud DevJam Hackathon I Contest by TechGig, Semi-finalist in coding contest at TechGig Code Gladiators 2020, 53 Gold badges in TechGig Code Gladiators 2020, Hacker rank(5*) Gold badges in problem solving, 1st Position in Robowar at IIT Dhanbad, 1st Prize in Home and Industrial Automation by ISA Kolkata Section, 1st Prize in Pradarshan Event in Prayukti 2019 at HIT, 2nd Position in ARMAGADDON 5.0 organized by IEEE HIT Branch.

He exhibits some rojects like, Designed a web application to display data visually for traders, Raspberry Pi based Security System using PIR and Image Processing, IoT based Drone for Military Application, Raspberry pi based live streaming video server with Image Processing Using Python and Linux, etc.

speakers.title: Automation Expert
speakers.name: Kusum Singh
speakers.summary: Kusum Singh is a sophomore art sculpture student at Haldia Institute of Technology, and has won the prizes for Content Writer and Technical Orator, including the Divinity Circle. Kusum's exhibit features Automation that contain new Technology.
speakers.description:
Kusum Singh is a sophomore art sculpture student at Haldia Institute of Technology, and has won the prizes for Content Writer and Technical Orator, including the Divinity Circle. Kusum's exhibit features Automation that contain new Technology.

An avid water sports participant, Kusum understands the water in Automation ways in which others do not, or may not ever have the opportunity. Her goal in creating the ISA exhibit was to share with others the beauty, power, and flow of Automation throughout the world. In addition to the display, Kusum also hosts a session.

speakers.title: Electroincs Specialist
speakers.name: Rishav Dubey
speakers.summary: Rishav Dubey draws a crowd wherever he goes. Mixing street performance, video, music, and traditional art, Rishav has created some of the most unique and deeply poignant abstract works of his generation.
speakers.description:
Rishav started out as Electronics and Instrumentation, and now blends in Circuits to create a Artworks.' Rishav's innovations in using Electronics to express art have created a youth culture movement in his town of Bhagalpur, in which he remains at the forefront. In his role as the founder of Guidement Youtube channel, Rishav has become an inspiration to many up and coming students. However, the part Rishav insists is most important to him, is that he's helped many troubled youth take control of their lives, and create their own unique, positive futuresponse. Seeing kids he's mentored pursuing a grduation from a college, gives art the purpose that Rishav so craves.

A third-year student at the Haldia Institute of Technology.
